title: Make the Meta Quest 2 a Better VR Headset—and Portal to the Metaverse
sub_head: The headset once known as the Oculus Quest 2, from the company once known as Facebook, still has its flaws. Here’s how to fix some of them, and what they tell us about its future.
body:
Every time I put on the Meta Quest 2 virtual-reality headset, I have two thoughts:
#1: I love you, you magical device that transports me from my dirty basement to a floating pedestal on Machu Picchu.
